kv22.4:5.3: Atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṃ, dhammasākacchā, paripucchā, sīlasamādānaṃ, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogoti?
kv22.4:5.10: Hañci natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṃ … pe …
kv22.4:5.12: pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv22.4:6.4: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāroti?
kv22.4:6.7: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāro, no ca vata re vattabbe—
